original_text: So the people watched Paul carefully. They thought that his body would become very sick. They thought that he might die suddenly. They waited for a long time. But they did not see anything bad happen to Paul. So then they thought something different about Paul. They said, ‘This man is certainly a god!’
korean_text: 그들은 그가 붓든지 혹은 갑자기 쓰러져 죽을 줄로 기다렸다가 오래 기다려도 그에게 아무 이상이 없음을 보고 돌이켜 생각하여 말하되 그를 신이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: So the people watched Paul carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들은 바울을 주의 깊게 지켜보았습니다

sentences.original_text: They thought that his body would become very sick
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 몸이 아주 아플 것이라고 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: They thought that he might die suddenly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 갑자기 죽을지도 모른다고 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: They waited for a long time
But they did not see anything bad happen to Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 바울에게 아무 나쁜 일이 일어나는 것을 보지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: So then they thought something different about Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 바울에 대해 다르게 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: They said, 'This man is certainly a god!'
